alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lamoille, northern Caledonia and southern Orleans Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barton Village, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyndon, St. Johnsbury, Orleans, Greensboro, West Burke Village, Lyndonville Village, Stannard, Orleans Village, Wheelock, Glover, Albany, Burke, Willoughby, Sutton, Barton, Greensboro Bend, Barton Village, Walden, Albany Village, and Sheffield. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 138 and 163. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
